Game library

Discover new games to rent or buy

Dive into a world of adventure, strategy, and fun with our carefully curated collection of board games to rent or buy. From timeless classics to the latest sensations, our shelves are packed with games waiting to be discovered.

New Games

Galaxy Pioneers

Utilise resources wisely, negotiate with alien species, and navigate cosmic events to expand your interstellar empire.

Number of players: 2-4

Ages: 12+

Castle Siege

Build your defences, rally your troops, and outsmart your opponent in this fast-paced medieval warfare strategy game.

Number of players: 2

Ages: 10+

Enchanted Forest

Explore the magical forest, discover mythical creatures, and complete quests in this immersive adventure game.

Number of players: 1-4

Ages: 8+

Mystery Manor

Uncover clues, question suspects, and solve the case in this thrilling whodunit game set in a haunted mansion.

Number of players: 2-6

Ages: 14+

Favourites

Ticket to Ride

Build train routes across the country, connect cities, and outscore opponents in this classic strategic game.

Number of players: 2-5

Ages: 8+

Catan

Trade resources, build settlements, and vie for control in this engaging game of strategy and negotiation.

Number of players: 3-4

Ages: 10+

Carcassonne

Place tiles to build cities, roads, and fields while deploying followers to control territories and score points.

Number of players: 2-5

Ages: 7+

Azul

Compete to create the most beautiful tile patterns in this visually stunning and strategically challenging game.

Number of players: 2-4

Ages: 8+
